::Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Retilica turns back around, looking at Burning Hammer.

"An assassin, eh?" he says, looking the bot over, "So you're just joining for 
the battles?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike nods, looking at the kangaroo.

"Great, follow me," he says, walking into the Alliance base, hoping this bot 
was more cooperative than the one his 'brother' was trying to recruit.
